pullRequest.body:
Define a general functor from `TopCat`Â to sheaves on `CompHausLike P`Â satisfying some properties, and redefine `topCatToCondensedSet`Â and `topCatToLightCondSet`Â in terms of that functor.

---

This simplifies #15321, which the characterization of discrete condensed objects (#14027) depends on.

- [x] depends on: #15518

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:

- ...

Deletions:

- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.
